inclusion.criterion: oral or intravenous antibiotic therapy which started within 24 hours of enrolment
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: other severe chronic diseases (eg, neoplastic diseases)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: major medical problems (eg. immunocompromised, major developmental or genetic abnormality)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: taking any of the study products (or probiotic strains included in the study products) at the time of study commencement
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: use of antibiotics within 4 weeks prior to enrolment
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has dizziness and severe diarrhea since yesterday. He has returned from an international trip few days ago and was living in a camp in Sudan for a month.
